bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with wei jue 痿蹶, dysfunction with loss of mobility . Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry fu zi 附子 quoting Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 : 主風寒，咳逆邪氣，溫中，金瘡，破癥堅 積聚血瘕，寒濕踒躄，拘攣膝痛，脚疼冷弱，不能行步 , “It controls wind cold and cough with counterflow of evil qi; warms the center, [cures] wounds inflicted by metal objects; breaks open concretion-illness hardness, accumulation and collection, with blood comglomeration-illness; [cures] cold moisture with sprain and limping; cramps with contraction and aching knees; legs that ache, are cold and weak, so that one cannot walk”, writes: 風寒咳逆邪氣，寒濕踒 蹶，拘攣膝痛，不能行步，破癥堅積聚血瘕，金瘡 , “Wind cold and cough with counterflow of evil qi, cold moisture with sprain with loss of mobility , cramps with contraction and aching knees so that one cannot walk, breaks open concretion-illness hardness, accumulation and collection, with blood conglomeration-illness, [cures] wounds inflicted by metal objects”.
